meta.name: description
meta.content: MSD Wabash County schools serve students in Preschool to Grade 12. We focus on student choice and offer STEM opportunities, AP and dual credits, and highly competitive athletic teams.

a.aria-title: Click here to return to the home page.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

br.span:
574 students, or one out of every five of our students, choose MSD Wabash County as the best school for meeting their needs instead of the neighboring school districts in which they reside.
Call and schedule a visit to make MSD Wabash County your School of Choice.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

br.span: Two MSD Wabash County robotics teams competed in the World Competitions in Kentucky. Our teams competed against students from Indiana, across our country, and from around the world.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

br.span: 97.87% of our students at Northfield and Southwood High Schools graduated in 2018-2019. This extraordinary rate, the best in the county, is a result of the relationships our staff develops with each student, starting as young as Preschool. These relationships are fundamental pieces to the growth, development, and well-being of our students

div.div:
MSD of Wabash County is closing all schools and cancelling all school-related activities for the remainder of the school year. Please review our informational page for more information.
Updated April 13, 2020 @ 5:00 PM
